description: A full course load for a first year student.
A full course load for a 2 first year students who are firends.
A small test size of 2 friends each enrolled in 2 courses, with no conflicts.
A single full year course with terms A and B.
A single course without determined dates or times.
A single course (CISC-204) with satisfied prerequisites (CISC-121, MATH-110).
A single course (CISC-204) with non satisfied prerequisites (CISC-121) however (MATH-110) is satisfied.
A single course (CISC-204) with non satisfied prerequisites (CISC-121) and (MATH-110) a full year course, therfore has no solution.
A single course (CISC-220) with a satisfied corequisites (CISC-124) that was taken in a previous year.
A single course (CISC-220) with a non satisfied corequisites (CISC-124) therefore it must be taken.
A single course (CISC-220) with a non satisfied corequisites (CISC-124) which has a non satisfied prerequisite (CISC-121).
A single course (CISC-220) with a non satisfied corequisites (CISC-124) which has a non satisfied prerequisite (CISC-121) which has a non satisfied full year corequisite (MATH-110).
A single course (CISC-101) with an exclusion (CISC-121).
A single course (CISC-101) with an exclusion (CISC-121) which has already been taken.
2 courses with a time conflict, thus no solutions.
An empty data set that you can configure.
A complete data set containing all possible courses and sections (but no student data).
